name: Common Cape
description: The **Common Cape** is a cape given to all players who use their Microsoft account to log into the game at any point from May 6, 2025 to May 5, 2026.
obtaining: Players who used their Microsoft account to log into Minecraft on any platform during the distribution period to received this cape in both Bedrock Edition and Java Edition. A Microsoft account is required to obtain this cape, even on platforms where using one is not required to play the game.
